select ai.id, ai.code, ai.content, ai.status, ai.user_id, ai.agency_type, ai.create_date, ai.finish_date, ai.del_flag,
si.code as supplierCode, si.name as supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images as supplierImages from agency_info ai left join supplier_info si on (si.id = ai.user_id ) where 1 = 1 AND ai.agency_type = '1'
AND si.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
AND ai.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.code},"%")
AND ai.status = #{queryForm.status}
order by ai.create_date desc

select ai.id, ai.code, ai.content, ai.status, ai.user_id, ai.agency_type, ai.create_date, ai.finish_date, ai.del_flag,
si.code as staffCode, si.name as staffName, si.phone, si.images as staffImages from agency_info ai left join staff_info si on (si.id = ai.user_id ) where 1 = 1 AND ai.agency_type = '2'
AND si.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.staffName},"%")
AND ai.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.code},"%")
AND ai.status = #{queryForm.status}
order by ai.create_date desc
